pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa pariveṇavāsikā bhikkhuniyo yāguyā kilamanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.3: Atha kho so pūgo bhikkhunīnaṃ yāguatthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa āpaṇikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.4: “amukassa, ayye, āpaṇikassa ghare yāguatthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato taṇḍulaṃ āharāpetvā yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.5: Bhikkhuniyo tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.6: So pūgo jānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.10: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.12: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.15: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.19: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.20: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:2.21: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
